items.name: Youtube Music Skill
items.description: Youtube Music OCP Skill - search Youtube Music by voice!

items.name: Dictation skill
items.description: Continuously transcribes user speech to text file while enabled, made for ovos-dinkum-listener.

items.name: Volume Control
items.description: Control the volume of your system with verbal commands.

items.name: OVOS Spotify skill
items.description: OCP skill for Spotify. This skill requires additional setup and components.

items.name: TuneIn
items.description: OCP skill for TuneIn.
examples: play metal heart radio on tune in

items.name: Bedtime Stories
items.description: Listen to famous bedtime stories.
examples: Hey mycroft, read me a bedtime story
Hey mycroft, what bedtime stories do you know
Hey mycroft, read me little red riding hood

items.name: WikiHow Skill
items.description: How to do nearly everything.
examples: give me a random how to

items.name: Quote of the Day
items.description: Quote of the day from They said so
examples: where do you get your quotes

items.name: Date and Time
items.description: Get the local time or time for major cities around the world. Times are given in 12-hour (2:30 pm) or 24-hour format (14:30) based on the Time Format setting.
examples: what were the dates for last weekend
what were the dates last weekend
what are the days for this weekend
what is the date this weekend
when is it {offset} hours from now in {location}
when is it {offset} minutes from now
when is it {offset} seconds from now in {location}
what is the date for next weekend
what were the days last weekend
when is it {offset} hours from now
what are the days this weekend
what are the days for next weekend
what is the date next weekend
what is the date for this weekend
do you have the current time
what was the date last weekend
what are the days next weekend
what are the dates for next weekend
what are the dates next weekend
what are the dates this weekend
what were the days for last weekend
what are the dates for this weekend
when is it {offset} seconds from now
when is it {offset} minutes from now in {location}

items.name: ISS Tracker
items.description: Track the location of the ISS. Can also be used as an idle screen
examples: Who is on board of the space station
When is the ISS passing over
how many persons on board of the space station

items.name: Farting
items.description: OVOS will play a farting sound when requested or at random intervals. Just a fun skill that should generate a laugh or two.

items.name: Local Media
items.description: File Browser For Open Voice OS. For voice search, this skill builds a local index of scanned user media. Your collection needs to be organized in the following fashion to be detected by this skill: ~/OCPMedia/Music, ~/OCPMedia/Movies, ~/OCPMedia/Podcasts, ~/OCPMedia/...

items.name: Naptime
items.description: Put the assistant to sleep when you don't want to be disturbed.

items.name: Confucius Quotes
items.description: Quotes from Confucius

items.name: Alerts
items.description: A skill to manage alarms, timers, reminders, events and todos and optionally sync them with a CalDAV service.
examples: Set a bread timer for 30 minutes.
Schedule a tennis event for 2 PM on Friday spanning 2 hours.
Reschedule my 8 AM alarm at 9 AM.
Push the tennis event by one hour.
Move my next event one hour earlier.
Extend the bread timer by 2 minutes.
Change the 8 AM alarm recurring only Mondays and Tuesdays.
Change tennis event length to 3 hours.
Are there any events between Friday and Sunday?
How much time is left on my bread timer?
Cancel alerts between Friday 8 AM and 10 AM.
Remind me to walk the dog

items.name: 8 Fact
items.description: Random Facts
examples: how many facts do you have in your database
where do you get your facts

items.name: Wordnet Skill
items.description: Use Wordnet to answer dictionary-like questions.

items.name: Numbers
items.description: Facts about numbers, math, years and dates from http://numbersapi.com

items.name: XKCD Comics
items.description: Comics from xkcd.
examples: show me the latest xkcd comic

items.name: Finished Booting
items.description: Skill to speak when OVOS is ready

items.name: Unknown Handler
items.description: Capture unrecognized Utterances. OpenVoiceOS doesn't know how to do or answer everything (yet). This fallback is how the assistant lets you know that, unfortunately, it can't help with what you said.

items.name: Camera Skill (QML)
items.description: GUI ONLY! Take single-shot photographs with the Camera Skill.

items.name: Randomness
items.description: A skill for all kinds of chance - make a choice, roll a die, flip a coin, pick between two choices, etc.

items.name: Easter Eggs
items.description: Pop culture references skill. Some funny things for OpenVoiceOS, mostly quotes from movies.
examples: How to play rock paper scissors lizard spock?
How many languages do you speak?

items.name: Parrot
items.description: Turn OpenVoiceOS into a echoing parrot! Make OVOS repeat whatever you want.
examples: repeat Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary, Over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore
speak I can say anything you'd like!
Tell me what I just said.

items.name: Daily Blue Marble
items.description: Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera provides near real-time pictures of earth from orbit. Can be used as homescreen.
examples: tell me about Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera
open the epic website from nasa
what is the location of DSCOVR spacecraft

items.name: Good Manners Enforcer
items.description: Responds to insults and good manners. Monitors utterances and reprimands insults / foul language, while showing appreciation for good manners.
examples: please something (X times in a row)

items.name: News Streams
items.description: News streams from around the globe.

items.name: Wolfram Alpha
items.description: Use Wolfram Alpha for general knowledge questions.
examples: ask the wolf what is the speed of light
When was The Rocky Horror Picture Show released?
How many inches in a meter?

items.name: Weather
items.description: Get weather conditions, forecasts, expected precipitation and more! You can also ask for other cities around the world. Current conditions and weather forecasts come from OpenMeteo

items.name: DuckDuckGo
items.description: Use DuckDuckGo to answer questions.
examples: ask the duck about the big bang

items.name: Astronomy Picture of the Day
items.description: NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day.

items.name: Jokes
items.description: Let Mycroft brighten your day with a little humor from icanhazdadjoke.com. Chuck Norris jokes powered by pyjokes.
examples: Tell me a joke about dentists.
Do you know any Chuck Norris jokes?

items.name: ChatGPT Fallback Skill
items.description: When in doubt, ask ChatGPT, powered by OpenAI Solver. Capabilities include remembering what the user said earlier in the conversation and declining inappropriate requests.
examples: Explain quantum computing in simple terms
Got any creative ideas for a 10 year old’s birthday?

items.name: Device IP Address
items.description: Network connection information
examples: What network are you connected to?

items.name: Wallpaper Changer
items.description: Pictures from selected subreddits.
examples: show me a picture with dogs

items.name: Stephen Hawking
items.description: Tribute to Stephen Hawking, quotes from a great mind

items.name: Wiktionary
items.description: Find definitions of words using Wiktionary.
examples: Tell me the definition of apple
What is the definition for orange

items.name: Fallback Cakechat
items.description: A fallback that utilizes the CakeChat Emotional Generative Dialog System
examples: what is the meaning of life

items.name: Laugh
items.description: Makes OVOS laugh like a maniac. Laugh randomly or when requested, gender configurable

items.name: BandCamp Skill
items.description: Bandcamp skill for your hipster music needs.
examples: play center of all infinity album

items.name: Wikipedia
items.description: Query Wikipedia for answers to all your questions. Get just a summary, or ask for more to get in-depth information.
examples: Tell me about the Pembroke Welsh Corgi

items.name: SomaFM
items.description: OCP skill for SomaFM.

items.name: Spelling
items.description: Let OVOS help you spell words. OVOS can spell any word which is understood by speech-to-text. The proper spelling is pronounced on all platforms, as well as displayed by devices such as the Mark 1.

items.name: Soundcloud Skill
items.description: SoundCloud skill for OCP. Search SoundCloud by voice.

items.name: Movie Master
items.description: Find information about movies, actors, and production details. Easily find information about a movie with your voice.
examples: What genres does the flick _______ belong to?
Look for information on the movie _______.
Do you have info on the film _______?
What are popular movies playing now?
What films do you recommend like _______?
What are the highest rated movies out?

items.name: Audio Recording Skill
items.description: Record audio to file, requires ovos-dinkum-listener

items.name: Simple Youtube Skill
items.description: Simple youtube skill for better-cps. Search youtube by voice! This skill can be configured as a fallback matcher for play queries.
examples: play freezing moon with dead on vocals
play center of all infinity album

items.name: Application Launcher
items.description: Launch applications on the Linux desktop. The standard directories will be scanned for .desktop files, application names and execution commands will be parsed from there.

items.name: Countries
items.description: Data about countries from http://restcountries.eu/. Provides information about country population, area, language, borders, currency, timezone, capital, denonyms, etc.
examples: what is the size of portugal
what are the borders of portugal
what is the capital of portugal
what is the currency of portugal
what is the language of portugal
what is the population of portugal
what is the timezone of portugal
what are the people that live in portugal called
how many countries do you know about
what are the countries in europe

items.name: Assistant's Background
items.description: Learn history and personality of the assistant. Ask about the 'birth' and parentage of the voice assistant and get a taste of the community who is fostering this open source artificial intelligence.

items.name: Desktop Control
items.description: Control your mouse and keyboard by voice.

items.name: Algorithmic Art Skill
items.description: Creating art from math.
